files.patch:
@@ -31,1 +31,8 @@
-### LGPL 2.1
+### LICENSE
+```
+There are multiple licenses that apply to different parts of Glib. The
+overarching license is LGPL 2.1, however parts are covered by MIT and
+other parts by BSD-style licenses.
+```
+
+#### LGPL 2.1
